isis.stitle: DT-466E and 530E Diesel Engine Diagnostics Model Years 1999-2000 - DIAGNOSTIC TOOLS - TOOLS - BEYERS MODEL 200 PRESSURE TEST KIT (ZTSE2239)

svcsubproc.title: Description
svcsubproc.para: The pressure test kit can be used to measure intake manifold (boost) pressure, fuel pressure, air cleaner intake restriction, fuel restriction, exhaust restriction, and crankcase pressure. The pressure test kit can be used to test the accuracy of the gauges within the kit.
The 0-30 psi gauge can be used to measure intake manifold (boost) pressure.
The 0-30 in Hg vacuum gauge (0-14.7 psi) is used to measure inlet restriction in the fuel system .
The 0-60 in of H 2O (magnehelic) gauge (0-2.16 psi) can be used to measure air cleaner restriction or crankcase pressure.

caution.para: The quick disconnects have shut off valves in the panel connectors, not in the plug. DO NOT connect or disconnect lines that are under pressure.

note.para: When using the magnehelic gauge, be sure to plug the test line into the correct (pressure or vacuum) port. Use the pressure port to read exhaust back pressure and crankcase pressure. Use vacuum port to read air cleaner restriction. For both readings, the opposite connector must be vented to the atmosphere by installing a quick connect plug in the port.

svcsubproc.para: The 0-160 psi gauge can be used to check fuel pressure.
The 0-300 psi gauge is not normally used for engine diagnostic checks on International® engines.

svcsubproc.title: Operating Instructions
svcsubproc.para: Connect tubes between the test ports on the panel and the test points shown on the (rear side) Of Hard Start / No Start and Performance Diagnostic form EGED-180-2.
